name: LostEye
description:
Lost Eye is a game that i made to implement some new skills that i learned in coding.

it's a short horror game where you get trapped in a soldier's house.

Solve different puzzles to escape before you face your death.

Hope you enjoy playing it!

Note:-i'm aware of some minor bugs such as Zombie movement is slow/resolution Dropdown has multiple of the same resolution/ect. And i will update that ASAP

             -Forgot to add the game's title in the main menu.

             -All Assests used are under a CC0 license (not mine).

Also do you guys have the load game button on the main menu first time entering the game or no? Answers in the comment are appreciated.
